column1: Smoque BBQ////Get the sliced brisket! It's so tender it won't even stay on you fork! Being from Tennessee and living there for 25 years of my life I like to think I know my BBQ. This place is so good all around! The food and the friendly staff. If you live here in Chicago and haven't tried this place
column2: do it! If your in town visiting and have time to make a stop here you won't be disappointed. Just know that's its BYOB and cafeteria style seating arrangement. The patio is great on a warm summer night. Be prepared to wait on the weekend.
